name: ✧MAKAMESCO-MD✧ MULT DEVICE BOT
description: MAKAMESCO-MD Whatsapp device bot made by MAKAMESCO DIGITALSOLUTIONS enable a user to use whatsapp with more powerful features..

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

AUDIO_REPLY.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reply audio in all chats

AUTO_REPLY.description: when enabled it automatically sends  auto reply message to members in your chattings

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be react automatically (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

AUTO_BIO.description: This automatically update your bio status.Always make sure you insert your OWNER_NAME since it uses that to update your bio name status

AUTO_SAVE_CONTACTS.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto save contacts

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically and sent to you (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

PM_PERMIT.description: Restrict other users from using your bot in private messages (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

AUTO_STATUS_TEXT.value: Your status have been viewed by JEEPERS CREEPERS-XMD.

ANTI_CALL_TEXT.description: Type your anticall message to always send when calls are declined.You can as well leave it blank
ANTI_CALL_TEXT.value: My owner don't receive any call now because it's busy

BOT_NAME.description: you must name your bot huh!!!!!!

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Set 'yes' to make your bot public or 'no' to keep it private

SESSION_ID.description: Enter your session ID, the code you receive after scanning the QR code

OWNER_NAME.description: don't you have a name bro.Insert your name here!!

URL.description: you must add your bot image url.Get your image url now and fill it here

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your phone number (exclude '+' and area code, e.g., '254739385768')

WARN_COUNT.description: Set the warning limit for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Set 'yes' to display a starting bot message or 'no' to disable it

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 for online, 2 for typing, 3 for recording, or leave blank for real state

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Enable anti-delete message (set 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate)

ANTI_CALL.description: Automatically decline incoming calls (set 'on' to activate or 'off' to deactivate)

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Type true if you want bot to automatically  block those who spam your dm

CHAT_BOT.description: If you want bot to chat an answer messages in dem's put 'yes' to activate and 'no' to deactivate.

AUTO_REACTION.description: Set 'yes' to enable bot reactions to messages in private chats
